name: recipe-finder-mcp
description: AI-powered recipe discovery, meal planning, and nutritional analysis via Model Context Protocol
author: Devoxx Belgium 2025 Workshop

tools.name: search_recipes
tools.description: Search for recipes by ingredients, cuisine, dietary restrictions, or cooking techniques. Returns a list of matching recipes with basic information.

query.description: Natural language search query (e.g., 'pasta with tomatoes and basil', 'quick vegan dinner')

dietary.description: List of dietary restrictions that must be met

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_recipe_details
tools.description: Get complete details for a specific recipe including full ingredient list with measurements, step-by-step instructions, timing, and nutritional information.

servings.description: Adjust quantities for this number of servings

tools.name: analyze_nutrition
tools.description: Get detailed nutritional analysis for a recipe including calories, macronutrients, vitamins, and minerals per serving.

servings.description: Calculate nutrition per this many servings

tools.name: generate_shopping_list
tools.description: Create an organized shopping list from one or more recipes, consolidating duplicate ingredients and organizing by category.

recipeIds.description: List of recipe IDs to include

pantryItems.description: Items already in pantry to exclude from list

tools.name: check_ingredient_substitutes
tools.description: Find suitable alternatives for a specific ingredient, considering dietary restrictions, allergies, or availability.

context.description: Recipe context (e.g., 'baking bread', 'making soup') for better suggestions

tools.name: plan_meals
tools.description: Generate a meal plan for a specified time period based on dietary preferences, available ingredients, and nutritional goals.

days.description: Number of days to plan for

mealsPerDay.description: Which meals to include each day

prompts.name: recipe_critic
prompts.description: Professional recipe review with constructive feedback on techniques, proportions, and improvements. Provides expert-level analysis from a culinary perspective.

recipe_text.description: The complete recipe text to review including ingredients and instructions

focus_areas.description: Specific aspects to focus the review on

prompts.name: meal_planner
prompts.description: Generate a comprehensive weekly meal plan balancing nutrition, variety, and preferences. Includes shopping list and prep schedule.

cooking_time_available.description: Average time available for cooking each day (e.g., '30 minutes', '1 hour')

prompts.name: cooking_instructor
prompts.description: Step-by-step cooking guidance with detailed explanations of techniques, timing cues, and professional tips. Helps users understand the 'why' behind each step.

recipe_name.description: Name of the recipe to get guidance for

skill_level.description: Cook's skill level to tailor explanations

specific_step.description: Focus on a specific step number if guidance needed for particular technique

prompts.name: ingredient_expert
prompts.description: In-depth information about ingredients including selection tips, storage, nutritional benefits, and usage recommendations.

auth.note: For production, implement API key or OAuth authentication
